Under the leadership of Eric Schmidt , Google has branched into several new markets such as mobile devices with its Android operating system and the enterprise market with Google Apps. The company certainly hasn't been resting on its laurels, said Mike Davis . During his time at the company, Eric Schmidt has amassed 9.2 million Google shares, worth$ 5.8 bn.
